Translations.Text: No community (of faith) gets ahead of its appointed time and they would not delay

Then We sent Our messengers one after the other, every time a messenger came to a community, they denied him. So We made them follow each other (to destruction), and We made them stories (for the others). So away with people who do not believe
Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear reason
to Pharaoh and his assembly, but they acted arrogantly and they were bossy people
They said: should we believe in two human beings like us while their people are our servants
So they denied them both then they became among the destroyed ones
And We have certainly given Moses the book, so that they may be guided
And We made son of Mary and his mother a sign, and we sheltered them both on a hilltop having an accommodation and a spring (of running water)
Messengers, eat from the good things and do good work, indeed I know well what you do
And indeed this is your community, a single community, and I am your Master so be cautious of Me
But they cut up their affair (in the religion) into pieces among them, each party happy with what they had
So leave them in their ignorance for a while
Do they think that what We supplied them with it from wealth and children
We are rushing the goodness for them? No, they do not realize
Indeed those who are fearful of the awe of their Master
and those who believe in their Masterâ€™s signs
and those who do not associate (partners) with their Master
